holidays.title: American Citizenship Day

holidays.description: It's a great day to be environmentally conscious and support environmental initiatives.

holidays.title: Fastelavn
holidays.description: Why is Fastelavn celebrated, and how? Read on to know more about the carnival!

holidays.title: Finisher’s Medal Day
holidays.description: In a world obsessed with performance, Finisher’s Medal Day honors participation.

holidays.title: Forgiveness Sunday Orthodox
holidays.description: Prepare for Great Lent by forgiving those who have wronged you and also asking for forgiveness.

holidays.title: International Rescue Cat Day
holidays.description: Welcome a new member into your family by rescuing a cat today.

holidays.title: James Ronald Webster Day
holidays.description: This James Ronald Webster Day, let us learn more about the Father of Anguilla.

holidays.title: Namesake Day
holidays.description: Are you ready to find out who or what you were named after this Namesake Day?

holidays.title: National Banana Cream Pie Day
holidays.description: Get ready to dig in and indulge your sweet tooth this National Banana Cream Pie Day!

holidays.title: National Egg McMuffin Day
holidays.description: Mmm...do you smell that? That's the smell of a great breakfast!

holidays.title: National Old Stuff Day
holidays.description: Roll up your sleeves, clean out closets and garages, rediscover old treasures, and declutter your life.

holidays.title: Peasant Day
holidays.description: Let us applaud the hard work of farmers and appreciate their significance on Peasant Day.

holidays.title: Read Across America Day
holidays.description: Students, teachers, parents, and community members come together to celebrate the joy of reading!

holidays.title: Texas Independence Day
holidays.description: Hold on to your hats and boots as we celebrate Texas Independence Day in style.

holidays.title: Toddle Waddle
holidays.description: Join us this March as we get ready to raise funds for meningitis.

holidays.title: World Teen Mental Wellness Day
holidays.description: It’s okay to not be okay, and to ask someone for help when you need it.

holidays.title: Battle of the Oranges Ivrea
holidays.description: Grab your nearest ball of citrus because it's time for Ivrea's world-renowned Battle of the Oranges!

holidays.title: Dr. Seuss’s Birthday
holidays.description: The delightful characters and wonderful world of Dr. Seuss are celebrated on his birthday.

holidays.title: Becky G’s Birthday

holidays.title: Cindy Mello’s Birthday
holidays.description: Cindy Mello has grown immensely popular on social media, reaching over 1.3 million Instagram followers.

holidays.title: Janhvi Kapoor’s Birthday
holidays.description: The world is watching as this talented actress takes the world of Bollywood by storm.

holidays.title: Jon Bon Jovi’s Birthday

holidays.title: Luke Combs’s Birthday
